title: World's First AI Assistant Launches
description: DeepSeek releases an intelligent assistant, revolutionizing human-computer interaction.
body: It understands complex requests and provides efficient solutions, marking a new AI era.

title: Scientists Discover Habitable Exoplanet
description: A planet 100 light-years away may have conditions to support life.
body: Located in its star's "Goldilocks zone," it could have liquid water, raising hopes for finding aliens.

title: Electric Vehicle Range Breaks Record
description: New solid-state battery enables 930 miles on a single charge.
body: This breakthrough could eliminate range anxiety and is slated for mass production within two years.

title: Central Bank Starts Digital Currency Pilot
description: The digital yuan will undergo large-scale real-world testing in five major cities.
body: The pilot covers retail, transport, and more, aiming to boost payment efficiency and explore future money.

title: Major Breakthrough in Biodegradable Plastic
description: New material decomposes fully in nature within three months.
body: Developed by a domestic team at low cost, it offers a viable solution to combat white pollution.
